google_play_reviews.content: Like it! Started looking around for a client that didn't mess my timeline up and this is so much better than the official app. One problem I've increasingly noticed is that media content posted by someone using "Twitter for Advertisers" does not show up in tweets, you have to do "Open in Browser" to see it (and unless the tweet refers to the media, it's not always obvious that there is media in the tweet). Update: All good things come to an end. X com blocking 3rd party wins out.
Completely broken, says wrong API

Works fine with a server that not mastodon based U can upload a lit of images i uploaded 10 in one post U can resize text and make it big which something i miss in lot s of apps Lot s of options to explore What i miss is edit posts and see a tab for pinned posts Thank you dev for this great app

The bad news is that Twitter has blocked third party apps, so that function is gone. The good news is that Twidere is also a Mastodon client, and works well as that. Its ability to work with multiple accounts is handy if you're a member of more than one instance (swipe in from the left to open the panel, then Accounts, then "+" in the top right to add an extra account).

For anyone wondering why this isn't working: Elon completely cut off all third party twitter apps a couple months ago. It is not twidere's fault in any way. Giving it five stars as it was my favorite app for years.

For those who can't use Twitter anymore: Twitter removed their free apis, and hence free Twitter apps stopped working. To continue use you'd likely need to pay. Other than that I really liked how this app worked, but now outside of mastodon it is likely unusable. Let's see what authors decide to do..
i had no idea

But I'm here to give it a five star review anyway, because it's a genuinely good Mastodon app as well. Kudos to the developers.

UPDATE: Jan 2023 I've used Twidare for 5 years. It was the best free android app but the birdsite has now stopped its API. UPDATE 29/4/20 DMs now work! Awesome! Best twitter client ever. I never use anything else. UPDATE 28/11/19: For anyone who needs to login again to get twidere working, use the alternative twitter API keys available from the github comments of this app. I got it working again using a different set of keys. Twidere is far and away the best twitter android client.

Fantastic to take control cut through all the useless features Twitter pushes on their official app. Who knew Twitter is a good platform to interact with friends when there aren't 30 promoted tweets in the way? Really smooth and simple UI, I recommend this one if you don't want to pay.

A good replacement for Tweetcaster, which I used for years but now won't install on my new phone. Simple, clear interface, no ads, fast, and useful facilities. The only downside is that update notifications don't work - I haven't had a single notification since installing. In fact, auto-update doesn't seem to work at all, but I'm not bothered about that as I'm happy to manually update on opening.

Keeps crashing again and again. App is now unusable. [CONS] Unstable. Loading issue. Cannot reply with multiple pictures. Not possible to copy/paste url and @user from the bio. [PRO] Let you choose wich account to use when opening a twitter link from an other app, multiple customizable Timelines, better list manager than the official app.

Extremely nice that Twidere also supports other platforms, like Mastodon, so one can have all "microblogs" in the same app. Still the best, because all rest are worse.

Great app for Twitter use--it's great for app customization features like font size, colors for different accounts and tabs, and more modular list control than the stock app provides. There's some hiccups, like threading not working the way it does in the stock app, but I understand that that's limitations placed on the app because it's third-party. Overall, it's been great for years, and with support being picked up again, I'm hoping to use it for years yet.

google_play_reviews.content: Pretty solid app with its clean look and proper function, might grow on me. Need a bit tweak when login to get all the notifications (kudos to GitHub for the tutorial!), but overall it feels good. Please keep Twidere alive and well, developer! 🙂

Thank you so much for maintaining this! It was my favorite Twitter app and I could never find a replacement. I do have an issue with not being able to open shortened Twitter links in dm's. I'm not sure if it's intended. Edit: Figured out the problem and solution.

The best android app for Twitter. Threads appear perfectly. Image and video forwarding via whatsapp works like a dream. It remembers my last position. I scroll upwards to go through my feed. Loving every minute of it.

This app used to be the absolute best for Android, but I noticed I stopped receiving tweet notifications in a timely manner, despite all my settings being correct. I wouldn't get notifications until they all flooded in at once hours later. I switched to a brand new device and reinstalled the app, and the same thing is happening with this new phone, so it's definitely not an issue with my device or settings. :(
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We understand how annoying that must be. We're working on a solution. Many thanks.

google_play_reviews.content: The only decent Twitter client in existence. The only issue is that it lacks polls support.

Leagues better than the official app! Love the background transparency and square pictures option, it looks stunning.

google_play_reviews.content: Hands down the best Twitter client there is for Android. I love it so much.

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent twitter client; works extremely well. Would like to make 2 suggestions, please, for the future: 1. choice of displaying absolute time item was tweeted, rather than time since it was tweeted; 2. an intermediate type of filtering/muting, where the tweet from the filtered person is reduced to a single or 2 lines rather than completely hidden.
A very slick, quick and satisfying to use app. It may lack some features like polls or embedded video and audio media, but it's fairly customizable and easy to handle. Long live Dimension.

Tweets seem to randomly stop loading after going back a few days on the main feed. Plus, the media tabs on people's profiles doesn't show any images. There also doesn't seem to be a way to block likes and retweets from showing up on the timeline or in lists.
filters are a godsend
This is my favourite twitter app works lovely and very customisable love it!

Very beautiful useful software. One issue though, scrolling down to see olde tweets, after a point, the older tweets do not load up. Not matter how much you swipe up at the bottom to load older tweets you find that nothing happens

google_play_reviews.content: Since for some reason, I couldn't log back in on the official Twitter app, this has proven a great substitute. I had been using Twidere until a few months ago when it stopped working. Found that developers had stopped working on it. Had to switch to Owly and Plume - but they did not provide the same experience - especially with tweet threads that were retweeted. Very happy to see this resurrection as version 4.1.2. However an issue with liking tweets - see that developers already working on a fix. Will move to 5 stars when that is fixed. Update: as advised by the developer, a re-login fixes this. Thanks.

WORKING AGAIN☺(followed Dev’s instruction), THANKS . google_play_reviews.content: I'm so glad that this app came back to life! This is by far the best Twitter client out there.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it!

google_play_reviews.content: Looks ok, but lacking features like viewing images on timeline and likes given to me are not part of notification tab. Not sure if I will continue using it or not. No bookmark feature and the fact that you can't choose how to see tweets on your timeline if your have multiple accounts is a problem (you will see tweets from all the amounts you have. Switching account doesn't change the timeline).
Yooooo the recent update is so good. I can now receive DM. Nice!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
Thank you for your comment! Thanks for the support.

google_play_reviews.content: The dev team is pushing updates again but a lot of the same issues still exist.. Polls don't show. Quote replies to your own tweets dont show as mentions. DMs are finally coming in the app but replying is weird. Still can't quote retweet with media--not an "issue" but indeed a much needed feature.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we tried to reproduce about RT with media. Can you inform us what's the problem and whether you're using your custom API/key? Many thanks.

google_play_reviews.content: Now fix most bugs
Very nice twitter app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you

google_play_reviews.content: I can accept that! Thanks, you're the best!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: For Old DM - Twitter's DM API can only fetch DM within the last 30 days. https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/sending-and-receiving/api-reference/list-events   -- I hope Twitter can open up more and we will work on some work around as well!

google_play_reviews.content: Great app! The best customization I have ever seen. I only find the scale option for timeline media here, which shows all pictures in full without croping any of them. Just wonder is it possible to have a media only timeline? On iOS many apps are capable to do so, hope it is also possible on Android.

Pros: this is updating again. Two updates have dropped in the last couple weeks, and some weird jankiness already seems to be fixed. Cons: this is updating again. New updates means new bugs too. At least they seem to be fixing the new bugs quickly.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your support, we will fix this issue soon.

google_play_reviews.content: Great!!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

google_play_reviews.content: Working great. Would be great if there's option bottom navigation bar.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your support - Will work on that as well

google_play_reviews.content: Picture in picture mode in the app would be awesome since it just got removed from the official twitter app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your kind feedback. We would consider it seriously in future updates. If you have any suggestions or questions, please feel free to contact us at info@dimension.im !!.

google_play_reviews.content: Favorite Twitter app when it works. Conversations/replies never load for me after recent update
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We suffered a glitch but it will be fixed very soon. Many thanks.

google_play_reviews.content: Not only is Twidere being regularly updated again, it seems, after a long period of wishing and hoping that one of the best third-party Twitter apps could be used without fear of obsolescence, but with the latest update, DMS. FINALLY. WORK. Five stars.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it! We will also keep improving it as well!

google_play_reviews.content: Stopped working 2 days ago. There doesn't seem to be a reason? Loads fine. Just doesn't refresh the timeline, or anything else. No setting changes that fact. Uninstalling, and reinstalling does nothing. Hope this is fixed soon.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Susan, can you try to upgrade twidere to 4.0.8 ? It will fix these bugs - Thanks!

google_play_reviews.content: Melhor cliente para Twitter de todos! Sempre descubro alguma coisa nova. Maravilhoso. Edit: depois de algum tempo, o app começou a quebrar. Não envia mensagens. É econômico, mas incompleto.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you!

google_play_reviews.content: The default background in Dark Mode just changed with the latest update to be much darker. My eyes have trouble with it. The previous background was more of a dark grey that was very easy on the eyes. I can't find an option to put it back.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. We will try put back the `dark grey` back pretty soon!

google_play_reviews.content: Much nicer experience than the official app or website!
This is right there in the list of top apps to use. Especially if you looking for an alternative for the official app. Settings app is rich with options.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app. :)

google_play_reviews.content: It's great that Twidere is back up and running again! It's a very simple user interface, smooth & clean. I love it! 👍
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience - we are back! and fixed many bugs (DM, RT, etc) in 4.1.1 -- have a try?

google_play_reviews.content: Update: Thank you dev for your quick reply. Initial review: From today, I'm unable to like tweets 😞 It shows an error message Network error: Empty data 🤔 Could you please look into this dev and push an hotfix for it? Ability to like tweets is a very basic functionality that should work as expected ✌
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, this is a issue of twitter API key and we're working on a fix. Thanks!

google_play_reviews.content: Great alternative to the official app which is stuttering alot for me ( OnePlus 7T). Sadly it seems to not have bookmarks feature. ☹️ Please correct me or accept my request to add it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your support, we will fix this issue soon. Bookmarks etc need Twitter APIs and unfortunately Twitter close these APIs lately.  We are working some workarounds. Thank you!

google_play_reviews.content: good
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks a lot for your rating and safe rides :)

google_play_reviews.content: Does not show my DMs at all. Tried reinstalling, yet the problem persists.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: UPDATE: Sorry for the inconvenience - we fixed these bugs in 4.1.1 -- have a try? | Hi Aamir, thank you for your comment. This issue is caused by Twitter API update, and we will fix this ASAP with a new twitter key. Thank you again.

google_play_reviews.content: Best Twitter app. It did stop working for a few months for me, but now I got a new phone with Android 10 and it seems to refresh again! I saw on GitHub it's now community maintained, and I really wish a bright future for this app!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We will keep maintain Twidere and try to make it better. Thank you for your understanding and pls share the words. :)

google_play_reviews.content: I got it to work after a few tinkering, tho I still would like to receive updates for this app. ❤ still the best twitter client for me.❤
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it!

google_play_reviews.content: Even though it's now dead it's still the best Twitter client ever made, and I'm gonna keep using it until it stops working altogether, and when that happens I guess I just stop using Twitter because what could possibly replace this?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We're back! And working hard to improve the app. Thanks for your download and feedback.

google_play_reviews.content: The app stopped working suddenly. Whenever I open the app it crashes and stopped working completely. In conclusion I can't use it anymore. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling but still not working
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience caused. We have fixed the issue. Kindly update the app and do give us 5 stars if you're happy with our service.

google_play_reviews.content: Until recently, this was the best Twitter app for Android. Open source, strictly chronological feed, no ads and good UI. Sadly, in late 2019 the developer has abandoned this app, i.e deleted it from the app store. At that time it also stopped working due to twitter API changes/API key issues. It would have been nice if the developer had pushed some last update that displayed an announcement before the retirement of this app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the bad experience. And we're back! The new version of the app is more stable and the update is available now.

google_play_reviews.content: Didn't seem to load tweets correctly in the background, but otherwise great

Amazing app & highly customizable! There's so much you can do with it. One thing I've noticed is that my mentions won't load. It says "No network connection" Please fix this, other than that it's a great app.

Twidere has saved my battery life. The official Twitter app was draining my battery horribly. I thought i would give this app a try, the UI & customization options are amazing. The confirmation option for liking a tweet prevents accidental likes, so many great features. i love how if you dont finish a tweet, it auto saves as a draft, far superior to the official Twitter App.
Hasn't been updated for ages and is missing many useful features like polls and proper notifications.
Suddenly started getting Google Adserve Ads at the end of every video tweeted. Sort it out please Twidere... This is did not occur a few days ago and nothing else has been installed on my phone since

google_play_reviews.content: No ads. Really in chronological order. Perfect.

Excellent, simple and easy. Latest version is pretty much perfect for me.

google_play_reviews.content: This is still my favorite Twitter app despite having to reinstall it every time the lag gets too bad

Extremely customizable and straightforward.
I really liked this app for a while (even over Tweetcaster), but for several months now, DMs won't load (even when I force refresh). This has caused me to miss messages. Not cool.
pls give updates

Is there even a way to keep the TL from immediately going to the latest tweet on refresh? I don't understand why anyone would want or need this (it's never HARD to navigate to most recent tweet!) but I can't find a setting to turn this off. I just want to read tweets in rev chron order.
for some reason DM's send or receive isn't possible anymore. is the app still being supported?

Promising app. Very configurable. Some missing key features, such as when you quote a tweet it just puts "RT @" etc rather than properly allowing you to quote like most other clients. Also when you like a tweet or hit retweet it doesn't let you select which account you want the tweet to come from. It's great for replying to tweets however. If they fixed this, would be 5 stars from me
Gif support is a paid portion of the app, unable to use gify extensions they are just uploaded as an image. I keep coming back to this app, but it's not quite as solid as the native Twitter app.
A proper timeline! No ads! Still plenty of Nazis though.

I really liked the app for a while. Great features, nice look, good performance. It's pretty good with multiple accounts unless you're searching for people to follow. It doesn't maintain the same account for multiple searches very well. The real problem is that it is not supporting my direct messages even a little.
Love the ease of switching between accounts, even to like or retweet a post - but DMs don't work or even give a notification. Also impossible to tell who liked a tweet. I want to love this app...
Unable to fix timeline disorder seems conrtrolled by main Twitter app
Lists doesn't get auto updated like the inbox

google_play_reviews.content: Quite a few features from native Twitter are missing, such as polls (STILL) but the other features make this a valid alternative. Pretty outdated.
Would prefer media to be displayed in-line rather than needing to do extra tap.
Laggy and slow, it's maddening.. but still preferable to the official twitter app
Great but two things that don't really work. 1. Can't seem to get my DMs to work on a tab. 2. Widgets don't work.

It's pretty good. I like the presentation, lots of customisation features. Big BUT ... Recently DMs are not coming thru, or getting sent. Can't yet figure out why, all relevant authorisations, nothing changed in the app settings. What happened??

I love the app in general but I just found out that I do not get notified when people DM me. That's a huge let down so I may have to switch apps if this doesn't get fixed.

It used to be my favorite third-party Twitter app, but recently I have been experiencing problems with DMs: I can't send them and after using the web page to do it from the browser, the new messages sent (and subsequent replies) don't show up on the DM tab.
Used to be great but now I get errors when sending DMs. And new DMs aren't displaying. Unknown what other features aren't working correctly suddenly :/

Everything ia fine. A bit doesn't feel as snap, uses a bit too much battery comparing it to the version one year ago but everything works fine. On the notifications tabs there's still no fav/like or rt. Only mentions.

I like it a lot but I'm not sure if it has push notifications that's my only problem with it truly I have streaming on and I favorited who I wanted and turned on notifications on their profiles and I still don't get them at all.

As much as I like the app, after a while it starts to lag so much to make it unusable. A real shame.

Struggling to find a simple replacement for the official Twitter app, and this is nearly it but seems quite buggy. Also, their 'notifications' tab only shows replies, not retweets and likes, as the official app does. Annoyingly, the official app doesn't work on my phone so the search continues. Could be the best twitter app EXCEPT it refreshes to the top of ur timeline and there is no option to set to last read, or at least just remember last known position. So frustrating to have to scroll back down and find where you last read. So close yet so far. :(

If you want a Twitter app that just shows you your timeline in order, this is the app for you. It doesn't do anything stupid like put random likes in your feed. And it's very good at letting you keep your place while refreshing. Good stuff!

This is what i called TWITTER LITE. Twitter should fund this developer... there is some bugs like the video player.. high quality videos cant properly play on my androis jelly bean. Pls fix this. Thank u ♡

Now advertises "promotions" (IE ads) for "advanced features." I'm not sure if this is a proprietary fork of their old product or if they just don't expect people to modify their source code to remove the ads... But this is very annoying.
Doesn't populate Twitter handles when you put @ in front
Brilliant
Hurrah, can once again access settings and own profile. Performance still bad compared with two versions ago.

I was using this favourite app for 2 years with custom rom and It's running quite fine in lollipop 5.1. It did not have some issues nor trouble, great app literally. But the recent update makes it worst, my phone suddenly got bootloop after upgrading it. I had to do factory reset because of one issue, like come on... Please fix it.
My device reboots each time I try to install the last update. Otherwise this is by far my favorite twitter/mastodon app. The last update available through f-droid isn't as recent as this one too...
I love this app! Great work so glad the fediverse has this. I am however currently having a problem with crashing when editing profile on galaxy note 7.
Cannot delete DM 😣
非常好的一个应用
Changing account colour does not carry over to combined timeline. Please fix.
It brings back the old style tweeting experience, no more "liked by your friends" or "in case you missed" it just shows the TIME line as a time line.
Auto refresh doesn't work. Twitter feed doesn't refresh automatically after designated minutes

I've been using this app for a few days and I'm so glad to see tweets chronologically. Such a great thing to have back. Just one issue I've come across - the app doesn't handle twitter polls. All good aside from that.
This is brilliant app. Hope you guys will add poll and video option in next update. GROUP DMs not working.  ADD POLL AND VIDEO OPTION and Group DMs are not showing.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Video feature added! Poll and group DMs are not possible yet since Twitter won't allow other apps do that.

google_play_reviews.content: Best app

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Published 3.1.1.5, notifications and unread counts should working.

google_play_reviews.content: The best Twitter app ever.
ive been using this app for a long time, but last update crashes on start (august 1)

Doesn't cope well with threaded tweets, and doesn't always display previews from news items. I can live without seeing notifications for retweets and likes, some users may find this annoying. I'm not sure I like having to have 1 timeline for multiple accounts, but having tried a few alternatives to the official app (which no longer works on my phone), I like this one best. Good degree of customisation, nice design.
Best Twitter app out there. Love it!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: 3.0.5 fixed that, it's available now.

google_play_reviews.content: Best overall replacement for the official app I've seen so far.

"We fixed many bugs" And it still doesn't allow us to login. The Twitter login page claims the username / password is wrong even though the exact same combination works flawlessly in the official Twitter app. If you're serious about offering a paid product, a bit more care would have been nice. I'd recommend to just implement login with Google, unless that's only possible for the official Twitter app.
Cannot add emoji to Twitter profile

Updated review: Been using this for a few months now & feel I can offer a better review now I know my way around. App is exactly what I was looking for as a twitter replacement: light, customisable & does not hog/slow my phone. Perfect as a heavy twitter user who relies on Dm's as a form of communication. Only request I have is for different colour bubbles in DM section as that can get pretty confusing where they are the same. Notifications are a little slow but nothing major. Overall very happy!
It's not simple to use but it gaves you the flexibility you're getting in original desktop site. Quite hard but the more days you use it, the more used to it you get.
If you have some money to spare, it’s not the best Twitter app, but it’s definitely the best FREE one.
This app looks great. Is there a way of getting notifications of likes and retweets as well as mentions please?
Better than the official Twitter app, but got some issues like not loading all messages and loading weeks old notifications instead of latest ones.
Works like a charm, and obviously 100 ways better than official client

Better than the official Twitter app. Twidere makes Twitter look like old Twitter. My biggest complaint with the official app was there was no way to stop seeing a person's "loved" tweets, even if you turn off their re-tweets. I don't see anyone's "loved" tweets with this app. Also, the size of this app is much smaller compared to the official app.
Would be almost perfect if every update didn't break something. Current issue: hangs/freezes often for several seconds at a time

Love the app and customize of transparency. I love the split black % white screen shown above the icon. There is a black & white setting but did not produce the screen shown above? Default black & white setting the same look. Not a split screen of black & white with reverse font?
Can you add favorites to notifications please? This app would be perfect if you did that.
This is the best Twitter app atm but please update the icon to a more modern look thanks!
Unfortunately, does not have a widget that allows me to view my timeline, so this is not useful for me.
So far so good, just sometimes loading image is bit slow. But still best 3rd parties of twitter apps

Good 3rd party app for Twitter!

Combined with a custom API key, Twidere is practically a perfect replacement for the official app. I just wish the multiple account support was better. Instead of other apps where you switch between separate timelines for each account, you just add new tabs for that timeline. It's never entirely clear which timeline you're on or which one you're retweeting to either which has lead to me accidentally retweeting some embarrassing things to my main Twitter account.  please add a single account mode to switch between them more easily and itll be perfect
Updated the app and now images and Gifs don't load. How do you update and ruin the app more? Fix it please

Amazing app for twitter. Been my go to app for twitter.. Loved it.. The only feature i want is that it shud b able to show us the poll option of twitter..... I cnt vote on.. Because the feature does not exist.. So. Do. Add it.. N it will b perfect
cannot see all media, but still a good Twitter client. Best of all it's ad-free!
It connects from twit links nicely however. It doesnt show all the media from a user when u look at other people's. Furthermore pls enable medias downloaded to be movable directly after download

Amazing its simple to use 5 stars love it
Have used six or so different Twitter clients across Windows phone and Android recently. All had issues. Have been using this for a few hours and looks to be the best so far.

google_play_reviews.content: Mangling replies on Twitter
Great app. Lovely replacement for Twitter's garbage offerings.

The best messaging client I've come across. I love the powerful filters, which help me keep my sanity while reading Twitter. Love the mastodon access. Would give it a 5, but it is missing CW (content warning) support. I'm sure that is soon to come.

Absolutely excellent Twitter client.  I have used Tweedle for a long time but it's starting to show its age and since my phone is a bit too old for the official client I've been looking for alternatives.  Twidere is definitely my favorite. It's lightweight and fast.  Has all the features I need including some advanced ones I was missing in Tweedle like the ability to mute users and create filters.  The interface is very nice and it has tons of configuration options.  Highly recommended.
best Twitter app out there!

If you have two(or more) accounts, and switch from one to another, the timeline(messages also) remain from the first account, it doesn't change. No matter how many times I refresh. Other than that, it's nice app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Accounts in timeline can be changed by toggle in Drawer menu - Accounts. Your suggestion is also a great idea - This will be added in future releases.

google_play_reviews.content: My favourite alternative to the official Twitter app. Great customization options for the UI -- has an option for providing a like and retweet confirmation. Snappy and feature full. Only downside is that response/reply tweets are not chained together or linked with the original. Overall clean and effective.
by far the best Twitter app out there. sadly it's useless to me because it doesn't offer push notifications or any fetch interval shorter than 15 minutes

It's a great app, however it has a few boring problems like the miss of a button to open the "main menu" (I know you can open it by sliding the screen, but a button would make it quicker), also I couldn't make the search tab work.
Does not work
App had always been solid, last update has introduced significant lag and unresponsiveness.
Why the favorite notification not show up in interaction?
I love this app but why does it jump to the top when I refresh the feed now??? I have to keep scrolling back and trying to find my place. Really annoying
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You can refresh anywhere in timeline by long tapping a tab. This will trigger a refresh from top. Also you may like an option in Settings - Content called "Read from bottom".

google_play_reviews.content: perfect
Highly customization, fast and features rich.
Why this app can't load any images even i've actived the pre loaded images feature w wifi?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you only see a "Photo" label in tweet and want to see media itself, you can enable media preview in Settings - Cards - Media preview

google_play_reviews.content: Fast, beautiful and highly customizable
